title: Udyr's new splash is SICK!!!!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/uXuMs7v.jpg

It's on the PBE and I for one regret buying SGU, because I won't see this AWESOME splash every time I play ;(

LIK DIS IF U CRY EVERTIM

replies.body: I appreciate that you can see his sexy thigh, finally some revealing male-champion splashart.
Thigh of the tiger.
♫It's the... **thigh of the tiger!** it's the thrill of the **sight!**♫
Do you mean... thigher?
Ladies...
Bisexual gentlemen...

too bad it looks depilated like a soccer player :c
i mean ok for common aestethics but cmon, he' s a beast!
Let the man wax if he wants to!
{{champion:44}} ... Gems.
no :c
I like it, but it kinda looks like he tripped on a branch slightly offscreen.
More like smashed it while tripping and is now stance changing into a ferocious charge to try not to look like a complete dork who just got beaten by a tree

His old art wasn't great I admit, but imho, this new one seems to be the only one that actually made him worse - I see less of his face, I don't know what his physique is like now, the details of his clothes are incoherent and nonexistent, his color palette looks off. The only thing I see is an ugly bearded guy in a wolverine(?) skin who tripped as he was sprinting...there is so much more to Udyr than that which they could have exploited and featured. His stance changes, his communing with the spirits, all of which could have given his figure more detail and flesh out his identity. I now have less information about Udyr, what he looks like, or what he does than before.

Agreed.  Looks like he is about to faceplant the ground.  Also looks like he is on steroids or something - his arms are as thick as his head.  Previous skin is better.

If OP wants to see this skin, then he can just change it in champion/skin select screen.
tbh he looks like a crazed hobo with this but then again his in game skin looks like a giant turd.
like Fell down ~{{item:3070}} {{champion:77}} {{item:3070}}

Ummm, what?

That's definitely base Udyr, not Spirit Guard.

Spirit Guard will still have this splash:

http://www.leaguesplash.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/Spirit-Guard-Udyr.jpg
I mean that I regret buying SGU because I love this splash more
My background image. :D
You can still see his face :D (unless they updated it so that it's replaced with SGU)
They did... ;(

wait, what do you mean replaced SGU? I think SGU is still awesome. Though this new splash makes me cry every time since I played Udyr since I started LoL. :'D But SGU has more in his textures and voice. Unless they make a texture update for Udyr, then I might have to think on it. But his VU will only smooth his animations (a little), change his clothes, and we may see some new coloring on his skin and furs.

Gotta be honest. My minds pretty blown that Riot has out of nowhere started to rapidfire all these updated splash arts. Them updating splash arts that were already pretty good is no longer an issue since they're now dealing with all the elephants in the room! Hopefully they move over to skins soon. :D 

I wonder what has changed to allow them to update so many now.
One of the directors for WoW came over to LoL, and thats why they have had so many changes lately.
If you're talking about Ghostcrawler isn't he only on gameplay?

I had Primal Udyr, so...
FUCK YEAH.
the beggar Gang！gai bang~
